Name: Painters Guild
About the game: Painters Guild is a management sim where you control an art academy in the Italian Renaissance. Paint artwork as beautiful as the Mona Lisa. Hire painters like Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo and millions of randomly generated artists. Expand your guild and customize it with furniture and other options. Play in 3 different cities: Florence, Venice and Rome.
Meta Title: Painters Guild: Sep 1, 2015, Lucas Molina and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Painters Guild? Check out the release date (Sep 1, 2015), developer insights from Lucas Molina, and a complete game summary.
